pages.text: A new plethora of power has emerged. $(li)Swing$(li)Daze$(li)Blast$(li)Puncture(li)Atomize$(li)Lightning Aspect

pages.title: Swing
pages.text: Swing increases attack speed of a tool. $(br)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(li)$(l:tools/crowbars)Crowbars$() $(br)Levels: I-V

pages.title: Daze
pages.text: Daze inflicts slowness on a struck mob. $(br)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Blast
pages.text: Blast explodes a radius of blocks when using the hammer. $(br)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Puncture
pages.text: Puncture allows throwable tools to pierce armour. $(br)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/spears)Spears$() $(br)Levels: I-III

pages.title: Atomize
pages.text: Atomize yields the secondary crushing component of a block. $(br)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I

pages.title: Lightning Aspect
pages.text: Lightning Aspect lets unimaginable power rain down. $(br)Applicable to: $(li)$(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() $(br)Levels: I
